thread.title: Sports Illustrated, John Parker Wilson to honor cancer-stricken Danville football player
thread.title_full: Sports Illustrated, John Parker Wilson to honor cancer-stricken Danville football player

title: Sports Illustrated, John Parker Wilson to honor cancer-stricken Danville football player
text:
RELATED: Hogan's battle inspires Danville The magazine selected Hogan, 15, as its High School Athlete of the Month for September. Officials from SI and the United States Marine Corps will be joined by former Alabama quarterback John Parker Wilson in presenting the award to Hogan prior to Danville's home game Oct. 30 against Falkville . 
Daniel Boyette covers Huntsville region high school sports for The Alabama Media Group and The Huntsville Times. Write to him at dboyette@al.com.
